--- Switchblade / Dead-End / Drag Strip ---

Switchblade opens his commlink to find it jammed. He growls, 
pulls out his comm system, and rewires it, to avoid the jamming. 
"Nightstrike and Fireblade, keep your targets busy for a while, 
we're almost done at this battle," He jumps over the hill knowing 
that since he was cloaked he wouldn't be noticed until he made his 
first move. He circles around Element (G).

Dead-End transforms into vehicle mode, and rips over the hill 
heading toward Speedbreaker.

Drag Strip lowers himself to the ground, and lands near 
Speedbreaker, Astroblast, and Megatron. He says to Megatron, 
"Drag Strip here, we're waiting for Wildrider, and Motormaster."



On 12 May 2001, at 19:16, airly2000@... wrote:

> Nightstrike:
> 
> 
> "Hey Fire blade!!!" said mockly Nightstrike "Do you rather play with
> the reptile (IUron Raptor) or with his boyfriend?"
>

> > hill he had stood behind for so long.  He took out his rifle and
> > pulled out his montrous blade.  With his energy rifle he shot 10 
> shots
> > at the mutated IR.  At the same time he pointed his sword at IR and
> > sueezed the hilt with a proper amount of pressure and the sword 
> opened
> > like a mouth and shot one of two missiles designed by FireBlade. The
> > missile would explode once within 10 m of an enemy signature. All at
> > once in hte explosion would be an EMP blast plus liquid fire at 1000
> > plus degress C.
